channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deaij completely blocked. Has plastic sheeting and dirt inside., 22nd February
item.description:
The road rain gulley is completely blocked. It has plastic sheeting placed across it and is completely closed off by dirt and debris.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): William Foster Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves still not swept up, 22nd February

item.title: Continued littering, 22nd February
item.description:
Household Rubbish is being dumped by the cycle storage on Avondale Rise. The perpetrator, even goes to some length to back out the address labels of his parcels. However these still can be read. Kindly get in touch to discuss how this can be addressed and the appropriate fines imposed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Avondale Rise, Greater London

item.title: Broken retaining wall - loose bricks - pedestrian and vehicle hazard, 22nd February
item.description:
The retaining walls around Tranquil Vale traffic island have collapsed in several places leaving loose bricks and stones lying around. The collapsed wall and loose bricks are a trip hazard and dangerous for vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Parade, Blackheath, Greater London
